eu.stratosphere.nephele.util

Class NumberUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.stratosphere.nephele.util.NumberUtils

  • public final class NumberUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a number of convenience methods to deal with numbers and the conversion of them.

    This class is thread-safe.

    Author:
    warneke

        Reads and deserializes an integer number from the given byte array.
        Parameters:
        byteArray - the byte array to read from
        offset - the offset at which to start reading the byte array
        Returns:
